titles.title: Affirming the importance of the Electronic Proving Ground at Fort Huachuca, Arizona, to the United States Armed Forces and national security on its 60th anniversary.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
9/18/2014--Introduced. Recognizes that members of the Armed Forces face changing battlefield threats and unique enemy challenges that call for proven equipment tested at the Electronic Proving Ground at Fort Huachuca, Arizona.
Supports the long term viability of Fort Huachuca and its Electronic Proving Ground.
Expresses appreciation to soldiers and civilians for their 60 years of work at the Electronic Proving Ground and their service to the United States.
